title: Montecristo logo
content:
Thanks in advance for the help. I need to identify or at least find something that is similar to the font on top (Montecristo red type).  
I would perfer mac formats but anything is fine at this point. THANKS.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [montewhite-copy.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=montewhite-copy.jpg) | 34.97 KB |
author: easyc

comments.content:
Thanks.  
I found this [http://www.dafont.com/en/search.php?text=MONTECRISTO&nq=1&q=Machiavelli](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111214046/http:/www.dafont.com/en/search.php?text=MONTECRISTO&nq=1&q=Machiavelli) which I think may be closer.
